timeline.author: scholzj

replies.bodyText: Since the test is about testGenerateDeploymentWithOldVersion, I thought that the n - 2 version should be tested. Have I misunderstood it?
replies.author: sgkiokas

replies.bodyText: You are right. The 2.4.0 probably makes sense here 👍
replies.author: scholzj

chore: Kafka 2.5.0 support

- adds support for kafka 2.5.0
- drops support for Kafka 2.3.1
